## `ExcludeTrailingCitations` {#batch-excludetrailingcitations}

Specifies whether to exclude trailing citations.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeTrailingCitations(Exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
Exclude | `true` to exclude trailing citations.
